          <title>
            <string language="en">Setting the tone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einstellung des Tones</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Donner la tonalité</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ajustando o tom</string>

          <description>
            <string language="en">Building a student-centered classroom culture starts on the first day of the school year.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Aufbauen einer Kursteilnehmer-zentrierten

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Établir une culture étudiant-centrée de salle

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Construir uma cultura estudante-centrada da sala

            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo sviluppo della coltura allievo-centrata

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η οικοδόμηση ενός σπουδαστής-κεντροθετημένου

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La construcción de una cultura
